bullets.content: Adopt a 'Financial Horror' narrative framework by utilizing low-frequency ambient drones and a 'countdown to impact' visual overlay that tracks the time remaining until a predicted market event occurs.

Implement a 'Hostile Debate' structure where the two characters (Tsumugi and Zundamon) do not cooperate, but instead actively attempt to debunk each other's data points with 'Counter-Evidence Interruptions'.
Integrate 'Personal Survival Stress Tests' every 4 minutes, where the macro-analysis is paused to ask the viewer a specific 'What would you do?' question with a 5-second visual timer.
Execute 'Silver & Rare Commodity Deep Dives' as the primary Retention Engine. These topics consistently achieve >45% maintenance and establish the channel's authority among core finance enthusiasts.
Systematically link technical infrastructure deadlines (e.g., Windows 10/PC 2026) to the Narrative of General Economic Collapse to maximize reach among general tech-literate audiences.
Apply the 'Corporate Anchor' hook (mimicking the Yamae model) to all videos, starting with a specific company and massive data points to ensure >60% retention at the 0:30 mark.
Aggressively optimize thumbnails for 'Related Video' traffic (56% source) by limiting text to <5 words and utilizing high-contrast visual cues to break the 1.8% CTR bottleneck.
